resources.string: "Let's vibe and connect through our music tastes! Maybe we share some awesome song preferences and can totally geek out about them together. If not, no worriesâ€”give my faves a chance and let's spread the musical love!"

"Hello there! I'm Marvin Cayosa, currently a 2nd Year Bachelor of Science student majoring in Computer Engineering at the University of the East. I'm excited to share a little glimpse of who I am through this app I've created. Feel free to explore and get to know me better. Enjoy the journey!"
I would like to showcase the diversity of my musical genres. Here are the genres that i love and listen to.
Here are some of my personally curated playlist. Give it a listen!
I love play the guitar and perform live to other people.
Meet my small but happy family with two fur-babies!
